alert.note: Alert for Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:40PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Beaverhead County through 515 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Jackson, or 19 miles northeast of Salmon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wisdom, Jackson and Polaris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
